1.name: Generic Binary
1.description: A simple device that can be either on or off, like a lamp.

2.name: Dimmer
2.description: A device whose state can be regulated via pulse-width modulation (PWM).

delay.name: Step delay
delay.description: When updating the lamp's brightness, the delay (in ms) between each step.

3.name: RGB Dimmer
3.description: A lamp containing three separate outputs for red, green and blue light, each dimmable via PWM.

delay.name: Step delay
delay.description: When updating the lamp's brightness, the delay (in ms) between each step.

4.name: Shutter
4.description: An electronic shutter. Can be moved up or down.

tick_ms.name: Single move cycle
tick_ms.description: How long (in ms) the shutter should be moved, when moved one unit up or down.

full_movement_ticks.name: Full movement cycles
full_movement_ticks.description: The amount of cycles the shutter will be moved when moved fully up or down (with one cycle being the time specified above.)
